thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Luxey International (Holdings)'s Unit Signs MoU With Guangzhou Avlight Wisdom Technology

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Luxey International (Holdings)'s Unit Signs MoU With Guangzhou Avlight Wisdom Technology
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Luxey International (Holdings) Ltd :
* ‍LUXEY INTERNATIONAL SIGNS MOU WITH GUANGZHOU AVLIGHT WISDOM TECHNOLOGY CO REGARDING INVESTMENT IN AVLIGHT BY LUXEY HONG KONG​
* PROPOSED TRANSACTION AMOUNT IN RELATION TO 100% EQUITY INTEREST IN AVLIGHT IS ABOUT RMB300 MILLION​
* ‍LUXEY HONG KONG PRELIMINARILY PROPOSES TO INVEST NOT LESS THAN 10% EQUITY INTEREST IN AVLIGHT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
